description:
It's easier than ever to get that next climb logged with this purpose-driven pant.

Designed to be tough, soft, and functional simultaneously, the Kragg Pant comes with all the features you're looking for as you're mid climb.They are talking back pockets that keep things safe, handy easy-to-reach thigh pocket, and a cinch system at the bottom to secure the legs exactly where you want them.

If all that's not enough, they think you'll be happy to know you're also be looking out for the very planet you love exploring in this pant, thanks to its organic cotton construction.
name: Prana Kragg Pants, 32" Inseam - Mens
